* Nue'e was disappointed that Perndabot wouldn't answer her question beyond 
the fact that it was top-of-the-line and would probably have whatever she 
needed, it was information but not the kind she's hoped for.
She looked back over her shoulder at Biomass, him passing a glace that said 
not to ask anymore questions until they knew these stranger better.
Nue'e looked towards Swift, flashing her a smile while pushing her glasses 
back up her nose.
She then liiked way up at Perndabot and wondered what other kind of giants 
this planet held, but later would be the best time to find out.

Biomass looked at Perndabot.*

" And just whom is this commander you speak of?"

..........................................

* Tremmer didn't find whar Grimmler said funny, all his buddies were dead 
and if there was a Pred around he'd take out his frustrations on him.
But he couldn't help thinking how this man was just trying to make him feel 
better, his wiskers twitching in ammusement.
At his offer Tremmer got down on all fours and left the side of the pond.*

" Better 'ta let the dead rest, youngin'."

* He walked up to Grimmler and then stood on his hind legs again.*

" So, tell me about this Cybertrone'en Fire of yers."
